name: rEtiam
description:
rEtiam is a remake of my first ever game "Etiam" that I made 3 years ago:

It has some unpolished angles and I've thought about adding some other features like enemy ships with functional AI but I'm not sure if I'll do that yet. 

It was very fun working at it and I've learned a lot doing so.  But still it's one one my very first projects on Unity and I am yet to learn so much more~! Hope you will enjoy it at least a bit.

[To upload your highscore you need to open the Leaderboards tab, to view it - re-open the Leaderboards]

CONTROLS

W/S - Accelerate forward
A/D - Horizontal movement
Q/E - Roll
Left Control - lets you switch to a one plane movement in all 4 directions

Music, 3D assets and all other art and code related thing done by me. (Not counting some tutorials)
